Key: Yeah. It's been a while. Might be fun.
Ohhh?! This is a rare occurrence.

Well, lately, whenever I've invited you
places, you refuse me.
Huh?! Why are you snapping at me? Calm down!

How could you possibly understand my feelings?!
Playing mahjong, sad and alone?!

Then after all of that, at the start of the game,
I take Tenhou and immediately Game Over?!
Give me back my ¥100!

There's nothing I can do about that, even if you
tell me...

Today I'll finally have you to distract me from
my sorrows!

Hey, come on... Hm? Oh, shoot. Tonomachi,
I have to pass on the arcade after all.

Some friend you are! I hope you eat a yakuman
and never score again!
Ah... He left. Oh well. It's Tonomachi.
